title: Liar, Liar - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Harem   Psychological   Romance   School Life   Seinen
tags: Academy   Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Game Elements   Hackers   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Secret Organizations
author: Kuou Haruki   久追遥希
description: At Academy Island, everything is settled through 'Games' waged for a certain number of stars, with the strongest student being granted the ranking of Seven Stars. Hiroto, a transfer student, unexpectedly beats the strongest empress and becomes the pseudo-strongest in the school! A mind game of lies and bluffs begins!>
